doc.title: Escape from Paradise
doc.plot: Escape from Paradise was Amazon's #1 best seller for four years in Singapore, where it has been banned. The story is based a May Chu Harding's escape from her first arranged marriage in Singapore. May Chu comes from the flamboyant Tiger Balm family; her wealthy husband from Brunei with CIA connections . The difficulties May Chu encountered with corrupt lawyers and judges in Singapore made her highly publicized divorce extremely difficult. This was further complicated by the wealth of her ex-husband, Hin Chew Chung, the owner of X10, a company behind those bothersome pop-up ads on the Internet. The adventure takes place in Singapore, Brunei, Australia, England, and the United States, where interaction with the powerful people in Singapore, Brunei and CIA agent Dan Arnold. Included also is the United Kingdom's former Lord Chancellor Alexander Irvine.
